Scene:
Sakuramaru's Suicide
(Sakuramaru seppuku / 桜丸切腹)

Play: Sugawara's Secrets of Calligraphy (菅原伝授手習鑑)

Production: September 1970

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Takemoto Mojitayū IX (see also Takemoto Sumitayū VII) (竹本文字大夫 (九))



Shamisen Players:

Takezawa Yashichi X (竹澤弥七 (十))
